attributes.action: Publish the number of successful e-petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister claims the e-petition system to be a great success.  Yet, there is no information on this website on how many of these e-petitions have been successful in their aims. In other words, is the Government listening or just paying lip service. What is the point of an e-petition system if none of them are listened to and changes made.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear and specific call for action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
